wikipedia_page.main: John Carr Badeley (1794–1851) was an English physician.

response: Badeley was born at Elswick, near Newcastle-upon-Tyne,campbell-fine-art.com Sir Henry John Fanshawe Badeley the son of Captain Henry Badeley, originally of Guy Harlings, Chelmsford, Essex, and was educated at Radley College and Trinity College, Oxford.thepeerage.com Henry John Fanshawe Badeley, 1st and last Baron Badeley (Captain Henry Badeley's father was John Carr Badeley (1794–1851), MD, FRCP.)

response: * John Carr Badeley (1794–1851), English medical doctor
